summary: A year after his father's death in Mexico, Victor returns to Buenos Aires with a twofold mission. On the one hand, he brings with him a new project for his former theater company; on the ... See full summary »
cast: Julián Larquier Tellarini|Agustina Muñoz|Alessio Rigo de Righi|María Villar|Romina Paula|Elisa Carricajo|Laura Paredes
title: La princesa de Francia
